MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G32 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Carntyne Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:43PM. Our engineers have arrived at Marfield substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:40 PM on Wednesday, 11 November 2020.
